name: Pocky & Rocky with Becky [GBA]
description:
A long time ago, a goddess sealed the evil Hydra Dragon inside a cave to
stop to its hauntings across the land. But peace is abruptly cut short
as the evil ghost awakens and unleashes the most terrible mythical
creatures in revenge for its time of imprisonment. It's up to Pocky,
Rocky the Raccoon, or Becky to set out on a fantastical and dangerous
adventure to seal the Hydra Dragon once more!

Choose one of the three selectable characters, and collect magical items
and a variety of power-ups that enhance each character's unique spells
and abilities. Help them on their journey battling pesky ghosts and
monsters before the final showdown against the Hydra Dragon!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
